::Striker::

Striker presses a few more buttons, the pod ceasing to shake. "The trip there 
took too much energy, and it had too little time to recharge. We'll need to 
touch down for a short while."

Striker presses a few more buttons, the pod steeply dropping toward the ocean 
and then leveling out right above it. Striker sits back in a chair. He frowns 
as he hears a booming sound.

"Weather report."

The console beeps at the order, giving the readings of a storm.

"Great," Striker says, looking at the reading, "This is going to be a bumpy 
ride."
